## Test 1

```{r dag1}
dagify(y ~ x,
       y ~ z,
       labels = c(x = "Impfung",
                  y = "Symptome",
                  z = "Sonstige")) %>% 
  ggdag(use_labels = "label") +
  theme_dag()
```


```{r dag2}
dagify(y ~ x,
       y ~ z,
       x ~ z,
       labels = c(x = "Impfung",
                  y = "Symptome",
                  z = "Sonstige")) %>% 
  ggdag() +
  theme_dag()
```


```{r}
confounder_triangle(x = "Glatze", y = "Corona", z = "Alter",

  ggdag_dconnected(text = FALSE, use_labels = "label")
```
